keyMappings:
# Insert your preferred key mappings here.

# open google login page
map gb createTab https://gemini.google.com/app
# move tabs faster
map < moveTabLeft
map > moveTabRight
# Go to prev/next page of the site
map [ goPrevious
map ] goNext
# Open link in incognito mode
map I LinkHints.activateModeToOpenIncognito
# Scroll all the way to left/right
map $ scrollToRight
map 0 scrollToLeft
# Use t to navigate open tabs
unmap t
map t Vomnibar.activateTabSelection
# Hover links
map go LinkHints.activateMode action=hover
# Yank link text
map yF LinkHints.activateMode action=copy-text
# Hard reload
map R reload hard
searchEngines:
## Sort in alphabetical order based on the keyword used

## Amazon.it
amazon: https://www.amazon.it/s?k=%s Amazon.it
## DuckDuckGo
d: https://duckduckgo.com/?q=%s DuckDuckGo
## Translate to english
en: https://translate.google.it/?sl=auto&tl=en&text=%s&op=translate Translate To English
## Github
gh: https://github.com/search?q=%s&ref=opensearch Github
## Google images
gi: https://www.google.com/search?tbm=isch&q=%s Google Images
## Google maps
gm: https://www.google.com/maps?q=%s Google Maps
## Translate to italian
it: https://translate.google.it/?sl=auto&tl=it&text=%s&op=translate Translate To Italian
## Reddit
r: https://www.reddit.com/search/?q=%s Reddit
## Youtube
y: https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%s Youtube
## Wikipedia
w: https://www.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Special:Search&search=%s Wikipedia
## Wolfram Alpha
wa: http://www.wolframalpha.com/input/?i=%s Wolfram Alpha
## Z-library
zlib: https://z-library.rs/s/%s
